ygData.subject: Re: HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA
ygData.msgSnippet: The Violator shook wildy as it was pelted with autogon fire and other blasts. Quickly the ship unleashed a blast from the Vile cannon at the trainers base

The Violator shook wildy as it was pelted with autogon fire and other 
blasts. Quickly the ship unleashed a blast from the Vile cannon at the 
trainers base shields, the blast just as big as it was the first time 
it was used. It then locked onto the Infecticon ship and fired all 
four multi phase laser cannon blasts that were about to blow under the 
strain of the charging. The infecticon ship is hit bythe blasts as the 
lasers pierce its shields, a moment later it fires back at the 
Violator with one of its massive cannons making on of the thrusters 
explode outward. Inside Vile and the others fell over from the blast. 
Vile then stood and set a course for Antartica.

Vile: "With any luck the Infecticon ship wont pursue..."

The violator then began to fly away from the trainer base. As this 
happened the weapons fire that was fired at the Infecticon base were 
stopped by its shield that for the most part was invisible. The ship 
began to reposistion itself and once again it fired down the column of 
light at incarcinator, the 8 rings following down to surround him. As 
this happens 4 massive cannons along the edges of the ship begin to 
aim at the trainer base before each fires a massive blast at the base, 
each blast would go through the shields even with the variable 
shielding.(Heh this is a tech on the Infecticon ship, the eight main 
cannons on the ship are able to pass through all shields no matter 
what since they absorb the shields energy into the blast to create a 
hole in them. Yan has the bio and alloran already knows of this so... 
shielding for the trainer base is useless since these blasts are not 
like anything anyone has seen before. Whee not like they'll matter 
much longer since this ship is going to crash into the ocean in a bit) 
As this happens two blasts from within the ships metallic ring like 
structure fly down at Slyaer as another two fire down at starscream, 
another 4 at the Trainers base shields, these blasts would not 
penetrate the shields since they were from other weapons.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> #1 OK, the way the post was set up it sounded like the six photon 
torpedos
> and the two megas were coming from the same weapon.
> 
> #5 Transporter technology should still be considered as a form of
> teleportation because it gives one side an unfair advantage, 
especially when
> it can be broadcast into a base like that.
> 
> Anyways
> 
> The shields adapt as they were designed to to deflect the multphase 
weaponry
> and the laser cannons. The Photon torpedos detonated on impact 
shaking the
> base, Ignatius was nearly paniced by the nightmares and the shaking 
base. He
> rushed over to the computer, "Redirect all eccess shield energy into 
the
> repulsor shields, direct it at that ship." His orders would leave 
the base
> as a potential target for the Predacons if that much energy was 
expended.
> 
> "I don't think so Ig!" a voice called out over the speakers of the 
base.
> "That would be a major tactical mistake.."
> 
> The voice was familiar to the insane Trainer, it was one he hadn't 
heard in
> ages, since it had ceased on the planet Hydrus 4. The fifth member 
of
> Prebons old unit  was in the computer. Prebon must have downloaded 
his spark
> into the computer before they'd left. "I'm taking over from here." 
he said
> scanning the situation. Ignatius tried to override the computer but 
was met
> with unexpected force. The Stasis field changed frequency, it now 
held
> Ignatius trapped with the others.
> 
> The Repulsor shields let out a wave drawing energy from the very 
torpedos
> that were trying to destroy it. the explosion  shook the trainer 
base even
> more,  disabling the repulsor array. Now the Autoguns and variable 
freq
> shield were thier only defenses left. Autoguns continued fireing at 
the
> Violator. They had trouble locking on target so they couldn't aim 
for
> anything critical. The only thing they could do was aim for where 
the
> weapons fire was comeing from.
> 
> Other weapons struck the shields. Two autoguns turned and fired 
three shots
> each three at Starscream and three at Incarcinator
